# Tsuga Provider

The Tsuga provider is used to interact with the resources supported by Tsuga. The provider needs to be configured with the proper credentials before it can be used.


## Example Usage

```terraform
# The provider can be configured with a base URL and a token
# It can also be configured with the TSUGA_BASE_URL and TSUGA_TOKEN environment variables
provider "tsuga" {
  base_url = "https://api.tsuga.com"
  token    = "your-api-token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `base_url` (String) The base URL for the Tsuga API. Defaults to TSUGA_BASE_URL environment variable, or https://api.tsuga.com if not set.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) Bearer token for API authentication. Defaults to TSUGA_TOKEN environment variable.
